author: n3tsurge
description: This capability involves applying patches to systems and applications to remediate identified vulnerabilities. It ensures that all software is up-to-date with the latest security fixes, thereby reducing the risk of exploitation by adversaries. This process includes identifying vulnerable components, testing patches in a controlled environment, and deploying them across the affected systems.

requirements.description: Access to vulnerability management tools and patch management systems is required to identify and apply patches.
Knowledge of the specific vulnerabilities that need to be patched, including CVE identifiers and associated patches.
Testing environment to validate patches before deployment to production systems.

automation.description: Automated patch management tools to deploy patches across systems based on vulnerability scans.
Integration with vulnerability management systems to automatically trigger patch deployment for identified vulnerabilities.

title: Patch Vulnerability
